articles.title: Trump Media to enter prediction markets business
articles.description: (Reuters) -Trump Media and Technology Group said on Tuesday it will introduce prediction markets on its social media platform Truth Social through a partnership with Crypto.com, as event-driven markets continue to make inroads into mainstream finance.
articles.content: (Reuters) -Trump Media and Technology Group said on Tuesday it will introduce prediction markets on its social media platform Truth Social through a partnership with Crypto.com, as event-driven markets continue to make inroads into mainstream finance... [2003 chars]

articles.title: ‘Punjab needed its youth’: Why this migrant left Aussie life to build 'Punjab of his dreams'
articles.description: In a reverse trend, Sat Singh left his life and career in Australia to return to his motherland to create the 'Punjab of his dreams'. A Green visionary and economic strategist, Sat Singh, has been working with farmers in Punjab since 2017. He is not only educating them about the available renewable energy resources in the northern Indian state but also bringing the latest technology from around the world to the land of the five rivers. He says that the state needs its youth to realise its potential. Listen to a chat between Sat Singh and SBS Punjabi via this podcast......

articles.title: NMC leverages AI to enhance property tax database, boost revenues
articles.description: nagpur municipal corporation (nmc) is increasing leveraging new age technology for fine tuning its data base, mostly relating to property tax, a major revenue gainer. the property tax department tapped into artificial intelligence (ai) in a pilot project implemented at laxmi nagar zone and got startling result that enabled it to properly update its record as to change in nature of property.
articles.content:
Staff Reporter :
Pilot project in Laxmi Nagar Zone shows massive changes in property description
